tool_description: Get vital information on the most famous people in history. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/historicalfigures.
name: Historical Figures by API-Ninjas
title: Historical Figures by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/historicalfigures
api_list.description: API Ninjas Historical Figures API endpoint. Returns a list of up to 10 people that match the search parameters. Either **name** and/or **title** parameter is required.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset pagination.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: name of the person to search. Includes partial results (e.g. julius will match Julius Caesar).
